reviewText: Father Doug Lorig, a father and grandfather, combiines his experience with his abilities as a highly regarded spiritual director.  I wish I had had these insights about bringing the gifts we recieved at Baptism into our daily lives. Children prepared this way would have strengths to face the attacks before them.  The people and families were most generous in sharing real life situations. I bought them for couples newly engaged, women cousellors, a deacon, priests, and friends. God bless this much needed work.
